title: To The Land of Nevernight - Novel Updates
genre: Historical   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient China   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Black Belly   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Conflicting Loyalties   Corruption   Court Official   Determined Protagonist   Enemies Become Lovers   Older Love Interests   Politics   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transmigration
author: Mo Chen Huan   莫晨欢
description: After something horrible happens, a transmigrator can no longer sit back doing his inventions and farming shtick most other ancient-day farming transmigration novel MCs content themselves with. Instead he faces off against a scheming court as he tries to investigate the truth behind that incident, and accidentally gains a love interest he can’t be sure is trying to screw him over (before he realises he just wants to screw him).>
